analysis.description:
CheckpointToken.tokenBalances (/unique_chucks/24/0xc6563b56302896dd5de0b6c083e230baf8b11922.sol#959) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/24/0xc6563b56302896dd5de0b6c083e230baf8b11922.sol#1053-1056)
	- balanceAt (/unique_chucks/24/0xc6563b56302896dd5de0b6c083e230baf8b11922.sol#1065-1068)

	- issueTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0xc6563b56302896dd5de0b6c083e230baf8b11922.sol#1320-1329)
	- burnTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0xc6563b56302896dd5de0b6c083e230baf8b11922.sol#1342-1349)

Recoverable.recoverTokens (/unique_chucks/24/0xc6563b56302896dd5de0b6c083e230baf8b11922.sol#321-323) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,tokensToBeReturned(token)) (/unique_chucks/24/0xc6563b56302896dd5de0b6c083e230baf8b11922.sol#322-323)
